title: Tabbouleh with goat's cheese
ingredients: ['280 g (10 oz) bulghur wheat', '1 yellow pepper, seeded and chopped', '20 cherry tomatoes, quartered', '1 small red onion, finely chopped', '10 cm (4 in) piece of cucumber, seeded and chopped', '1 large carrot, grated', '5 tbsp chopped parsley', '2 tbsp chopped fresh coriander', '2 tbsp chopped fresh mint', '1 small fresh red chilli, seeded and finely chopped (optional)', "200 g (7 oz) rindless soft goat's cheese, crumbled", 'salt and pepper', 'Lemon and cumin dressing', 'Â¼ tsp ground cumin', '1 small garlic clove, very finely chopped', '1 tbsp lemon juice', '3 tbsp extra virgin olive oil', 'To serve', 'lettuce leaves', '12 radishes, sliced']
